column1:
Does anyone else get weird sense of satisfaction when you get a Â£2 coin in change


I've always found it strange since I was little and even now because it's perfect change for a bottle of beer (I live up North were the alcohol prices aren't extortionate). Does anyone else get this?

When the frig do seagulls sleep


Just walking home at 4 o'clock in the fucking morning followed by a flock of the bastards looking for a bit of my kebab shop pizza.

You'd think the wankers would have been okay with my greggs they stole last week

British ladies, would you think a guy (or gal) was cheap if he took you to a wetherspoons for a first date?


I like simple food so I think I'd prefer to take a girl there.   But then I don't really do romance
